special_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. If that card has mana value 2 or less, you may play it from exile this turn.
[+1]: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. If you exiled an artifact or creature card this turn, create two instead.
[0]: Create a Treasure token. If you exiled a card that had a mana ability this turn, create two instead.
[-1]: Comet deals 2 damage to any target. If you exiled an instant or sorcery card this turn, Comet deals 2 damage to any target.
